article: in the lifeless hollywood thriller `` deception , '' ewan mcgregor plays an impossibly nerdy new york accountant : a man with no family or friends and so sexually innocent that when he works up his nerve to call a sex line , he ends up giving the girl tax advice .
abstract: unk the greatest trick in deception will be getting the audience to stay interested
